sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Dashboard.css'; interface VehicleOrder { id: string; model: string; year: number; country: string; orderDate: string; status: 'ordered' | 'shipped' | 'clearing' | 'completed'; totalCost: number; expenses: { vehicleCost: number; fuel: number; duty: number; driverCharge: number; clearanceCharge: number; demurrage: number; tax: number; cno: number; cif: number; }; currency: 'USD' | 'JPY' | 'EUR' | 'GBP'; profit?: number; } const Dashboard: React.FC = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); // Sample data const [vehicleOrders] = useState([ { id: 'ORD001', model: 'Toyota Camry', year: 2023, country: 'Japan', orderDate: '2024-01-15', status: 'completed', totalCost: 25000, expenses: { vehicleCost: 20000, fuel: 500, duty: 2000, driverCharge: 800, clearanceCharge: 600, demurrage: 300, tax: 600, cno: 100, cif: 100 }, currency: 'USD', profit: 5000 }, { id: 'ORD002', model: 'Honda Accord', year: 2023, country: 'Japan', orderDate: '2024-02-10', status: 'clearing', totalCost: 23000, expenses: { vehicleCost: 18000, fuel: 450, duty: 1800, driverCharge: 750, clearanceCharge: 550, demurrage: 250, tax: 550, cno: 100, cif: 550 }, currency: 'USD' } ]); const getStatusBadge = (status: string) => { const statusMap = { ordered: 'badge-info', shipped: 'badge-warning', clearing: 'badge-warning', completed: 'badge-success' }; return statusMap[status as keyof typeof statusMap] || 'badge-info'; }; const formatCurrency = (amount: number, currency: string = 'USD') => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: currency, }).format(amount); }; const totalAssets = vehicleOrders.reduce((sum, order) => sum + order.totalCost, 0); const totalProfit = vehicleOrders.reduce((sum, order) => sum + (order.profit || 0), 0); const completedOrders = vehicleOrders.filter(order => order.status === 'completed').length; const pendingOrders = vehicleOrders.filter(order => order.status !== 'completed').length; return (
{/* Key Metrics */}
üí∞

{formatCurrency(totalAssets)}

Total Assets

üìà

{formatCurrency(totalProfit)}

Total Profit

‚úÖ

{completedOrders}

Completed Orders

‚è≥

{pendingOrders}

Pending Orders

{/* Navigation Tabs */}
{/* Tab Content */} {activeTab === 'overview' && (

Recent Orders

{vehicleOrders.slice(0, 3).map(order => (

{order.model} ({order.year})

Order ID: {order.id}

From: {order.country}

{order.status.toUpperCase()}

{formatCurrency(order.totalCost, order.currency)}

))}

Quick Actions

)} {activeTab === 'orders' && (

Vehicle Orders Management

{vehicleOrders.map(order => ( ))}
Order ID Vehicle Country Order Date Status Total Cost Profit Actions
{order.id} {order.model} ({order.year}) {order.country} {order.orderDate} {order.status.toUpperCase()} {formatCurrency(order.totalCost, order.currency)} {order.profit ? formatCurrency(order.profit, order.currency) : '-'}
)} {activeTab === 'expenses' && (

Expense Breakdown

{vehicleOrders[0] && Object.entries(vehicleOrders[0].expenses).map(([key, value]) => (

{key.replace(/([A-Z])/g, ' $1').replace(/^./, str => str.toUpperCase())}

{formatCurrency(value)}

))}

CNO & CIF Tracking

CNO Status: Approved
CIF Value: {formatCurrency(550)}

Payment Methods

Demurrage Payment: Bank Transfer
Currency Status: USD
)} {activeTab === 'reports' && (

Monthly Reports

September 2024

Total Sales: {formatCurrency(48000)}

Total Profit: {formatCurrency(5000)}

August 2024

Total Sales: {formatCurrency(35000)}

Total Profit: {formatCurrency(3500)}

Analytics Summary

Average Profit Margin: 20.8%
Best Performing Country: Japan
Total Vehicles in Stock: 12
)}
); }; export default Dashboard;
